item.title: Errors in mail.log from nagios check_ssmtp
item.description: I got my nagios server banned by fail2ban because of errors in the postfix mail.log log. I know that I can simply whitelist the nagios server but I prefer it working perfectly. Checking the logs I could see this error repeating itself on each check: Mar 25 13:01:13 xxx-123 postfix/smtpd[17065]: connect from nagios.example.com[1.2.3.4] Mar 25 13:01:13 xxx-123 postfix/smtpd[17065]: improper command pipelining after QUIT from nagios.example.com[1.2.3.4]: Mar 25 13:01:13 xxx-123 postfix/smtpd[17065]: disconnect from nagios.
